name: Dan C.
feedback: Fantastic find! A neighbourhood gem!!! Outstanding authentic Greek salade, huge portions, and very fresh. Ps. I love eating at a place where the owner is the cook...thanks George!!!

name: Brandon H.
feedback: My favourite Greek salade in the city! I've been telling all my friends that this place is a must try

name: Steffi M.
feedback: I am greek and this is one of my favourite places to get a quick fix in Mississauga. Lovely staff, always on time with orders, I like getting the Greek salad! So yummy! It's  the most authentic and for sure, nothing comes close.

name: Lula G.
feedback: I love this place! Everytime we come here, it's always been such a great experience!!! The food is awesome... drinks are lit, the vibes and the service are on point. Bruschetta is great and the lemon dessert is no less than Divine
